tiralabyra

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiralabyra.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a bitmap image of a labyrinth.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Image(java.lang.String path)
      Read an image from a given file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(java.lang.String path)
        Read an image from a given file. This should be an RGB bitmap. The entry should be colored with entryPointColor and the exit with exitPointColor. Walls should be wallColor.
        Parameters:
        path - Filesystem path to the input file.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()

      • getNumberOfPixels

        public int getNumberOfPixels()

      • getIndexForPixel

        public int getIndexForPixel(Point point)
        Get a linear index for any pixel, starting from 0 at the top-left.
        Parameters:
        point - XY position of the pixel on the image.
        Returns:
        A linear index for the given pixel coordinates.

      • getPixelPositions

        public Point[] getPixelPositions()
        Generate point objects for all pixels in this image.
        Returns:
        A list of all possible pixels on the image.

      • plotPathAroundIndex

        public void plotPathAroundIndex(int index,
                                int brushRadius,
                                int color)
        Draw a filled square around the coordinates indicated by the given linear pixel index. Wall pixels are left as is. Used to draw thicker lines around a path for better clarity.
        Parameters:
        index - Linear index pointing to the center pixel of the drawing action.
        brushRadius - Size of the drawing brush.
        color - Which color to use.

      • containsPosition

        public boolean containsPosition(Point point)
        This point is inside the image boundary.
        Parameters:
        point - Coordinates of the requested pixel.
        Returns:
        True if the given coordinates are inside the image boundary.

      • isTraversableAt

        public boolean isTraversableAt(Point point)
        There is a non-wall pixel at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        point - Coordinates of the requested pixel.
        Returns:
        True if there's a non-wall pixel at the given coordinates.

      • hasEntryPointAt

        public boolean hasEntryPointAt(Point point)
        There is an entry pixel at the give coordinates.
        Parameters:
        point - Coordinates of the requested pixel.
        Returns:
        True if there's an entry point pixel at the given coordinates.

      • hasExitPointAt

        public boolean hasExitPointAt(Point point)
        There is an entry pixel at the give coordinates.
        Parameters:
        point - Coordinates of the requested pixel.
        Returns:
        True if there's an exit point pixel at the given coordinates.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String path)
        Save this image as a file.
        Parameters:
        path - Filesystem path of the image to be written.
